Our LEED Gold Certificate Achievement

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2044&user=10620> 	

We’re proud to announce that four of our facilities have been awarded LEED Gold certification! 
This milestone strengthens the credibility of our Net Zero commitments and Group-wide Sustainability Strategy, while showcasing our dedication to global green-building standards. From green energy transition to water and energy efficiency and responsible waste management, this achievement reflects the real impact of our sustainability journey. 
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2044&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Women in Tech - Last day to register

chunks.text:
We’re proud to announce that four of our facilities have been awarded LEED Gold certification! 
This milestone strengthens the credibility of our Net Zero commitments and Group-wide Sustainability Strategy, while showcasing our dedication to global green-building standards. From green energy transition to water and energy efficiency and responsible waste management, this achievement reflects the real impact of our sustainability journey. 
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2044&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Women in Tech - Last day to register

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2045&user=10620> 	

We’re thrilled by the overwhelming response for Women in Tech!

Our Women in Tech programme has received an amazing number of registrations, reflecting the passion and commitment of women eager to shape the future of technology. 

Today is the final day to register <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2045&user=10620>  – don’t miss your chance! 

Join us in this empowering journey to learn, grow, and lead the digital future.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-2-min.png> 	

People in Focus | Abdullah AlMadhi

Today is the final day to register <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2045&user=10620>  – don’t miss your chance! 

Join us in this empowering journey to learn, grow, and lead the digital future.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-2-min.png> 	

People in Focus | Abdullah AlMadhi

Abdullah joined us in 2021 as a Maintenance Coordinator and has since grown into his current role as Administration & Facilities Manager for the Central Region. From leading office relocations to driving operational excellence, he values the collaboration, trust, and shared vision that inspire him every day. 
This Saudi National Day, he feels proud to be part of a Group that values people, growth, and community. Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2046&user=10620> 
Happy Saudi National Day to our Saudi colleagues and community!


 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2046&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-7-min.png> 	

Vision 2033 - 33 Days Challenge

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=2047&user=10620> 	

Day 11 of our Vision 2033 – 33 Days Challenge!

Jeremy Denisty, Director of AI, reminds us that AI is transforming the way we work, create, and connect with consumers and invites us all to stay open, curious, and proactive in shaping this future together.
